About Me

I am a 25 year-old web developer living in Bristol, UK. I work for Actual Experience in Bath, mainly on front-end stuff using a heady mix of HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript plus a generous sprinkling of PHP, bash scripting and other bits and pieces. I also written an Android app for Actual Experience, download it if you like

I am a big rugby fan, although I no longer play, I watch as much as I can.
